title: Ravindra Jadeja Climbs A New Mountain, Becomes Fastest Left-Arm Bowler To Take 200 Test Wickets
text:
Ravindra Jadeja Climbs A New Mountain, Becomes Fastest Left-Arm Bowler To Take 200 Test Wickets

Ravindra Jadeja Climbs A New Mountain, Becomes Fastest Left-Arm Bowler To Take 200 Test Wickets

Ravindra Jadeja took his 200th Test wicket in the first match vs South Africa and is now the fastest left-arm bowler to do so.

He went past Rangana Herath, who had achieved it in 47 games, by reaching milestone in 44.

ap

Don't Miss 10.5 K SHARES 1.3 K SHARES 1.5 K SHARES 247 SHARES 449 SHARES

Dean Elgar was the scalp as he was caught brilliantly by Cheteshwar Pujara.

200 Test wickets for @imjadeja 👏👏

He is the quickest amongst the left-arm bowlers to reach the mark 👌👌 pic.twitter.com/ihilr9kkWM — BCCI (@BCCI) October 4, 2019

Mitchell Johnson (49), Mitchell Starc (50) and are next on the list.

ap

The 30-year-old debut against England in 2012.
